COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x118
STRING: When I woke up I noticed that things were not the
same as always, which confused me a little.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e
STRING: I was sleeping on a towel instead of bed sheets,
perhaps that was the reason.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x144
STRING: I got up and stretched, but found that my whole body
was aching.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x150
STRING: On my bed, Lise was sound asleep, breathing
peacefully.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x176
STRING: [Lise] “＊zzz＊ ＊zzz＊”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18c
STRING: She looked so calm, the events of yesterday seemed
like a figment of my imagination.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x198
STRING: But in fact, she had been trapped in an unimaginable
situation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ae
STRING: And I'd been part of the cause.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ba
STRING: The bandage that had once gripped Lise's neck was
lying at the foot of the bed, and every time I looked at
it, I was wracked with guilt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d0
STRING: [Chris] “Li...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e6
STRING: I thought of calling her name, but I decided not to.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f2
STRING: She needed to rest now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fe
STRING: She'd been asleep most of the time since yesterday, but
that was fine.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x214
STRING: At this point, there was no way Lise could go to school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22a
STRING: Grave had donated a great deal of money to the school,
it seemed, so they were very accommodating.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x240
STRING: If she went to school, Grave would find out almost
immediately.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x256
STRING: It also bothered me that since our escape, Grave hadn't
made any attempts to contact us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26c
STRING: Whatever the case, he wouldn't just leave us alone,
would he?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x282
STRING: He was likely to spin this as a case of kidnapping, or say
that I had forced her to come with me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x298
STRING: Lise was still technically his daughter, after all, and the
both of us were still registered students.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ae
STRING: [Chris] “Phew...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c4
STRING: But... For now, at least, I needed to think of what to do
in the short term.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2da
STRING: Grave was bound to cause trouble, but I had to
consider my actions from this point on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f0
STRING: In other words, the issue of Grave was a complete
unknown.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x306
STRING: There was no way for me to come up with a plan
against him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x312
STRING: Those were the thoughts in my head as I watched Lise
sleep.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34c
STRING: [Lise] “...Hmm.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x362
STRING: [Chris] “Hey... Good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x394
STRING: [Lise] “Uh... Erm, I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3aa
STRING: Lise blinked several times, then she sat up in bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b6
STRING: She looked confused for a moment by her unfamiliar
surroundings, but then she remembered.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d4
STRING: [Lise] “G-Good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ea
STRING: [Chris] “Morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41c
STRING: [Lise] “I... I really did stay over, didn't I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x432
STRING: As if it had all been a dream, Lise spoke in a whisper,
without the weight of reality.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x448
STRING: Still, I couldn't forget what had happened yesterday, nor
did I intend to ignore it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x45e
STRING: I smiled at Lise, partly as an indication that I'd take
responsibility for my actions.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x474
STRING: [Chris] “That's right. More importantly, you look like you
slept well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a6
STRING: [Lise] “...I did. But, what are we going to do now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c6
STRING: [Chris] “You'll live here, in my room. We'll have to gather
some things for you to use.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4fa
STRING: That wasn't what Lise was asking about.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x506
STRING: Even though I was fully aware of that, I had no other
answer for her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x512
STRING: There was also no avoiding the question of the
graduation recital, or of Lise's home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x528
STRING: As for the graduation recital, as long as I didn't care
about graduating, it could be given up quite easily.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x540
STRING: But at this stage, I couldn't say definitively that it was
the best course of action.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x556
STRING: The feelings I'd had when I first asked Lise to be my
partner were still alive in me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x56c
STRING: Which meant... Grave was the biggest problem on our
hands right now, without a doubt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x582
STRING: But, depending on which actions he took, our future
would be greatly affected.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x59a
STRING: Who knows, I might've already been expelled from
school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5b0
STRING: Of course, that was just one possibility.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5bc
STRING: Perhaps even Lise would be...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ca
STRING: It was also possible that he'd lost interest in this
runaway orphan, and decided to completely ignore her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ea
STRING: It would soon be a whole day that Lise hadn't gone
home; everyone in the house must have noticed by
now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x600
STRING: No one had made any moves yet regarding this matter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x618
STRING: Ultimately, everything was still in the realm of my
imagination.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x624
STRING: That's why I turned the conversation to the most trivial
matter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x630
STRING: Such things were the most important thing we needed
to stay alive.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x67a
STRING: [Lise] “Things for me to use... But, you don't have to...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x69a
STRING: [Chris] “I don't see any problem with it. But we don't
know how long you'll have to stay here, and even for a
few days, you'll probably need a lot of stuff.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e0
STRING: [Lise] “But Chris... What can I do for you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x700
STRING: Lise spoke a little indistinctly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x716
STRING: But I hadn't brought Lise here because I wanted
something.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x72c
STRING: [Chris] “Don't get me wrong, Lise. It's not that I wanted
you to do something for me. I just wanted to do
whatever I could, for your sake.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x768
STRING: [Lise] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77e
STRING: Whatever the case, I couldn't let Lise go back to Grave.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x794
STRING: What he called discipline was none other than abuse,
even if he were only a surrogate parent.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7aa
STRING: I didn't know at that point whether what I did had been
right.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c0
STRING: But seeing Lise's smile, I knew it couldn't possibly be a
mistake.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d6
STRING: I was worried, alright.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e2
STRING: But all we could do was spend the next few days like
this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f8
STRING: And even for such a life, we needed many things.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x85a
STRING: The two of us went to the main street where all the
shops were, so that we could pick up whatever we
lacked.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x870
STRING: We didn't need the umbrella, as the weather wasn't that
bad today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x886
STRING: I was actually worried about Lise, but she had insisted
that she was fine, so I had no choice but to let her
come.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8a6
STRING: At first she'd been a little hesitant, but as Lise acquired
more stuff, her expression gradually softened.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8bc
STRING: [Chris] “I guess this is everything. Is there something
else you think you might need?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8f8
STRING: [Lise] “No, it's really quite alright. I can't trouble you any
further.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x918
STRING: Like Lise said, we had bought the essentials, more or
less.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x924
STRING: Anything else could be obtained when the need arose.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x930
STRING: But one problem remained - Lise's clothes.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x93c
STRING: Lise was here now, after her escape from school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x948
STRING: I'd thought of letting her wear my clothes, but they
were a little too big for Lise's small frame.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x95e
STRING: And it was obvious that even if we did laundry every
day, Lise wouldn't have enough to wear.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x97c
STRING: [Lise] “...Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x992
STRING: [Chris] “...Ah, just thinking about stuff. What clothes
you'll need, for example.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ce
STRING: [Lise] “Cl-Clothes... I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e4
STRING: I wasn't a spendthrift, but I didn't have much savings
either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9fa
STRING: And I'd planned on picking only the bare minimum for
our needs...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa2c
STRING: [Lise] “Well... If you're okay with it, Chris...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa42
STRING: [Chris] “Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa74
STRING: [Lise] “...I mean, as for shirts... I'll borrow yours, Chris...
We don't have to spend money on those.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa94
STRING: [Chris] “As long as you're okay with it, Lise, I don't mind.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xab2
STRING: [Lise] “Then let's do that, please.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xac8
STRING: That left us with... underwear, and stuff like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad4
STRING: That was the one shopping experience I couldn't join in
on.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xae0
STRING: I didn't even know how much they were, so I handed
Lise my wallet and let her do her thing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb12
STRING: [Lise] “A-Alright... See you in a bit.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb2a
STRING: Looking a little embarrassed, Lise went inside the
clothes store.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb58
STRING: I looked up at the sky to pass the time, anywhere
except the inside of the store.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb6e
STRING: What were we going to do?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb7a
STRING: It was natural for Lise to feel worried.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb86
STRING: I too was pretending to go about daily life as normal,
and trying very hard to stay calm.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb9c
STRING: For now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba8
STRING: And when tomorrow came, for that day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb4
STRING: That was how things were going to be, probably.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbc0
STRING: Anyway, that was all I could do now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc20
STRING: [Lise] “Sorry for making you wait.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc36
STRING: Lise ran over holding a small bag to her chest.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc42
STRING: She looked so cheerful, I imagined that for a while,
everything had gone back to normal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc58
STRING: That smile gave me some courage, and the two of us
walked back to my place in the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca2
STRING: Endless ensembles.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcae
STRING: Moments of peace, supposedly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcba
STRING: We had everything we'd looked forward to, didn't we?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd6
STRING: Phorni hadn't shown herself since yesterday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce2
STRING: She was doing it out of concern, but I felt a little lonely.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf8
STRING: Of course, my feelings for Phorni were completely
different from those I had for Lise or... Arietta, previously.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd0e
STRING: But that wasn't a good explanation of what I felt for her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd24
STRING: She wasn't exactly family, nor merely a close friend.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd30
STRING: Roommate seemed close, but it wasn't something that
could be fully described by such a flimsy term.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd46
STRING: Phorni was Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd52
STRING: It sounded stupid, but that was that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd9a
STRING: [Lise] “What are you looking at?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb0
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? Nothing, just looking outside.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdce
STRING: [Lise] “So, you were looking at the rain?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xde4
STRING: [Chris] “...I guess so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdfa
STRING: I couldn't tell Lise about Phorni.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe06
STRING: If she never came back, it would be as if Phorni had
been just an illusion, there was nothing to prove she'd
existed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe1c
STRING: Aside from the memories deep within my heart, I had no
evidence, and memories were uncertain things.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe32
STRING: If I forgot about her, did that mean Phorni would cease
to exist?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe48
STRING: No, that probably wasn't the case.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe54
STRING: I'm sure she'd still exist, I just wouldn't be able to prove
it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe86
STRING: [Lise] “What about the rain were you looking at?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeae
STRING: Something had piqued Lise's interest, as she came over
to me and looked up at the sky too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xec4
STRING: It was dark and overcast.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed0
STRING: It could've been a sign of what lay ahead of us, so I
looked away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef6
STRING: [Chris] “Who knows? I'm not sure myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf28
STRING: [Lise] “Hehe... You're strange.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf3e
STRING: [Chris] “You bet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf54
STRING: We laughed, and then it was time to call it a night.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf86
STRING: [Lise] “Alright, I'm going to change...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf9c
STRING: [Chris] “O-Okay. I'll turn around, just let me know when
you're done.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc4
STRING: [Lise] “...Got it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x100c
STRING: Just to be safe, I closed my eyes and waited for her
response.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1018
STRING: I couldn't afford to buy Lise any sleepwear, so in the
end, she wore my clothes to bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x102e
STRING: Once she got under the sheets, her body was fully
covered, so that wasn't a problem, but...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1044
STRING: My clothes were too big for her, and revealed more of
her body than could be healthy for my imagination.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x108e
STRING: [Lise] “Okay, all done. You can turn around now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10d8
STRING: [Chris] “You're going to sleep now, yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ee
STRING: I looked back and saw Lise lying down on the bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1102
STRING: [Lise] “Yes. But are you going to sleep on the floor
again, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1122
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1140
STRING: [Lise] “How about sleeping together?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1156
STRING: [Chris] “...No, that's not going to happen.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1174
STRING: [Lise] “Why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x118a
STRING: [Chris] “Why...? Because it's not.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a8
STRING: [Lise] “This bed is too big for one person, isn't it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11be
STRING: [Chris] “It just seems that way because you're small,
Lise. If I get in, it's going to be cramped.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11e6
STRING: [Lise] “But you'll be warm that way, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11fc
STRING: [Chris] “Lise, I... I'll sleep on the floor.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x121a
STRING: [Lise] “Chris... Could you do it as a favor to me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1230
STRING: [Chris] “A favor?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x124e
STRING: [Lise] “I... I'm still a bit scared. I'm not used to being by
myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x126e
STRING: [Chris] “But I'm here... Why would you think that you're
by yourself?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1296
STRING: [Lise] “Because... You were looking somewhere far
away.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ac
STRING: [Chris] “...Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ca
STRING: [Lise] “Just now, you were thinking of something else,
weren't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e0
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12fe
STRING: [Lise] “And so Chris, can I please feel you... close to
me?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x131e
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1334
STRING: I had been thinking of something else.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1340
STRING: Lise hit the nail right on the head.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x134c
STRING: Even so, Lise was still the most important thing on my
mind, that wouldn't change.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1362
STRING: [Chris] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1378
STRING: But, if that was what Lise really wanted...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x138c
STRING: [Lise] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13a2
STRING: Lise put out her hand and pulled me close to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c8
STRING: Just as I'd said earlier, the small bed felt really cramped
with two people in it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13de
STRING: In order not to feel like I was going to roll off, I had to
get close to her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13fc
STRING: [Lise] “I guess it is a little cramped.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1412
STRING: [Chris] “I told you so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1430
STRING: [Lise] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1446
STRING: Lise held my hand in hers.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x145a
STRING: [Lise] “But this is how close we are.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1470
STRING: [Chris] “...Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1486
STRING: Close to each other.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1492
STRING: The simple truth of that statement warmed my heart no
end.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x149e
STRING: It seemed I'd be able to forget about those vague
worries until tomorrow morning, at least.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14b4
STRING: Today had passed, and the accumulation of these days
became the future.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ca
STRING: By the time we became aware of its existence, it was
already gone from us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e0
STRING: Indeed, we were only able to exist now, in this precise
moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14ec
STRING: And that's why I wanted to cherish that moment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1502
STRING: Lise's warm hand conveyed her body temperature with
certainty, and amid that mix of sensations, I fell asleep.
